ivory.lsh.data

Class SixtyFourBitSignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.lsh.data.Signature
      • ivory.lsh.data.SixtyFourBitSignature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable, Writable, WritableComparable

    public class SixtyFourBitSignature
extends Signature
    A version of BitsSignature specifically tuned for 64 bits. Uses an array of 8 bytes instead of the Bits object.
    Author:
    ferhanture
    See Also:
    NBitSignature
